TopicTitle: Choose your super power, then have it trivialized

Articles.Content:
It only works when your surroundings look exactly like you.

The ability to make it so every single family member of mine doesn't steal my turkey on Thanksgiving.

They take the mashed potatoes instead. And we ALL know that the mashed potatoes are the real best part...

I want to be able to duplicate myself.

Granted, but your duplicates get all mad and kill you

i want a mainsail engine that doesn't overheat in 12sec.

granted it overheats in 2 seconds

i want to have the power to grow to a size upon which i can look people the same age as me in the eye

Granted, that age is 2 months

I want to have the power to stand under 36 mainsails under full blast with nothing bad happening to me.

Edited June 28, 2013 by DarthVader

You then stand under 1 ANT engine and explode

I want to have the power to blink

Granted. Then you play SCP Containment Breach....

I wish I could charge electronics with my hands.

You burn your hand.

The power to convince superweegee4000 that this isn't the make a wish and have it horribly corrupted thread.

Then you realize I was doing the same thing as everyone else but wording it slightly differently.

I want the power to run on vertical surfaces.

Only when it's sticky enough.

Ability to stay awake at my will without getting ill or having serious side effects.

You find yourself with non-serious side effects, ie lots of itching.

The power to teleport objects short distances would be nice.

You can only teleport yourself when you're by a volcano.

The power to make non counterfeit u.s. dollars to appear to my side whenever I want.

They're so poorly made they can't even be counted as counterfeit.

I want the power to type incredibly fast.

You can only press the r key, but you can press it REALLY fast!

The ability to breath underwater!

Granted but it only last for 5 minutes every time you go under.

The ability to be a machine.

Rage097 will kill you before the transformation is done.

The ability to shift to another dimensional plane at will.

Granted that only for 3 dimensions.

The ability to be a cyberman.

The ability to be a cyberman.

But your operating system is Windows 8.

The ability to jump incredible distances.

Your legs are now as large as your body. In short, you're now a frog.

The ability to phase shift.

The ability to phase shift.

You're now really good horizontal shifting of periodic functions.

The ability to run at the speed of sound.

Your body won't be able to cope up and will be reduced to human puree after a while.

The ability to Titan.

granted but you cease to exist.

The ability to do temporal time shift.

You can only go back if you kill your grandparents.

The ability to play the guitar without it exploding in my hands.

Get yourself a box of adamantium guitar strings. You'll gonna break them everytime you'll play it.

The power to be invisible.

Only when your not moving a single muscle.

The ablitiy to have a party cannon that can decorate anything.

It decorates it in the exact way that it looks.

The ability to make Nuttela appear out of thin air.
